title: Trolls own the game now might as well join them
body: There is no longer a troll report but instead it was replaced with a negative attitude caused by the trolls. So its okay to go and try and make me people mad by trolling them. Yes this is now an okay thing in this game. Go ahead do all you want to troll people. Riot stopped caring and their friends will back them and report you for getting trolled by their friend.

replies.body:
Trolling is still punishable but what people fail to realize or understand is that it is much harder to detect than just poor chat behavior. In case you don't believe me [Here are](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/sU5wOfFJ-proof-that-the-automated-system-is-broken?show=rundown) two examples of gameplay trolls being banned. Yes it's just two examples, but it proves that they do get punished.

P.S. And before you say "oh that's not good enough" or "oh that proves nothing", just note that you claimed that gameplay trolls don't get banned and yet I provided two examples that prove otherwise.
